Text: John PostleHi Stacey Several weeks ago Amy Fitzpatrick contacted me about ifhow we could coach John By now you have obviously heard about our response This morning John called me and said he was ready to get started What I need from you is your ok via email is fine to do this We would continue to bill you your cost center as we have been doing for your other folks we are coaching Please call me or send me a note at your earliest convenience John and I have a telephone session scheduled for Tuesday afternoon Also Id like a summary from you of what outcomes you want the coaching to produce Take care enjoy the beautiful weather Jill
